info.title: Temando Platform API
info.description: Providing consumers with more choice and lowering the cost of shipping.

externalDocs.description: Read more about the Temando Platform API on Temando Developers.

post.description:
Returns a session token that can authenticate Temando API Platform requests. 

Request a session token using `bearerToken` and `accountId`, or `email` and `password`.

201.description: Credentials accepted and session token created.

422.description: Validation Error.

CountrySchema.description: A schema for representing coutries as valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.

AddressSchema.description: This is the schema for representing addresses.

countryCode.description: A schema for representing coutries as valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.

postalCode.description: The post or zip code of this address.

locality.description: The locality (i.e city, township) of this address. Some countries do not use this field; their address lines are sufficient to locate an address within a sub-administrative area.

dependentLocality.description: The dependent locality (i.e neighbourhood) of this address. When representing a double-dependent locality in Great Britain, includes both the double-dependent locality and the dependent locality,

administrativeArea.description: The administrative area of this address, ie. state.

longitude.description: The longitude value of a geocoded address.

latitude.description: The latitude value of a geocoded address.

items.description: A JSON API error object

openingHours.description: Represents the hours that a location is open for business

items.description: The standard opening hours for this location

exceptions.description: Special opening hours for this location, e.g. for holiday periods

closures.description: List of date-time ranges during which the location is not open for business

items.description: A date range

description.description: The description of the date range, e.g. Christmas Period

from.description: The first valid date-time of the date range

to.description: The last valid date-time of the date range, inclusive

openings.description: List of date-time ranges during which the location is open but does not           conform to default opening hours

address.description: This is the schema for representing addresses.

countryCode.description: A schema for representing coutries as valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes.

postalCode.description: The post or zip code of this address.

locality.description: The locality (i.e city, township) of this address. Some countries do not use this field; their address lines are sufficient to locate an address within a sub-administrative area.

type.description: The property type of the address.

dependentLocality.description: The dependent locality (i.e neighbourhood) of this address. When representing a double-dependent locality in Great Britain, includes both the double-dependent locality and the dependent locality,

administrativeArea.description: The administrative area of this address, ie. state.

longitude.description: The longitude value of a geocoded address.

latitude.description: The latitude value of a geocoded address.

Bearer.description: Requests made to the Temando Platform API must be authenticated with an Authorization header whose value is a valid session token. Session tokens expire and must be recreated for further requests to be made of the Temando Platform API.
